title: T206 Sale ++ Wagner + Left ++ PSA 8 OC

posts.post_title: T206 Sale ++ Wagner + Left ++ PSA 8 OC
posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine. 
“I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.

***** PLEASE ***** Correspondence ONLY to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]


[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=393076&d=1586296870[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=393077&d=1586296875[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=393078&d=1586296880[/IMG]

750, delivered.

This ones a "tad" :rolleyes: out of my grade range.  Will listen to reasonable thoughts and offers.

Also willing to trade (of course).  Here are some of my needs:

Needed Mid-tiers:

............ and final three Hindu SLs:  Ellam, Foster, Mullaney.

Thanks, Scott
